feed.title: Bazarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Bazarr: v1.5.2
entry.content: From newest to oldest: - Added frontend only Docker Image to support developpers eacb8b7 - Fixed profiles sync with Sonarr and Radarr. #2932 71cd0c8 - Fixed titrari provider advanced search endpoint. #2930 794b006 - Fixed subzero mods hearing-impaired removal regex broken in a82dca9. #2849 3a248b3 - Fixed small issues with subdl to improve throttling conditions c853de8 - Fixed Sub-Zero Hearing Impaired subtitle content modifications. #2849 a82dca9 - Improved backup restore to help fix long-standing issue. #2850 17024a9 - Updated keyboard interrupt handling code db49fd6 - Updated regex to not remove sign in ASS subtitles in embedded subtitles 2964a0c - Changed notification position to bottom-left to not obscure page navigation c752796 - Fixed improper detection of Chinese subtitles for embedded subtitles provider. #2914 ee817c2 - Fixed improper uppercase for some release groups in matching routine 82dad60 - Additional multiline log file fixes b4e4ea5 - Handle multiline log output without proper log file timestamp headers like produced by KnowIt errors e91b71c - Whisper - eliminate "missing/bad audio track" errors when files have multiple audio streams d6e7773 - Added an announcement about upcoming deprecation of Python 3.8 in Bazarr v1.6 85d75a7 - Added experimental Python 3.13 compatibility. #2803 759da8a - Replaced pipes with shlex in custom_libs/libfilebot/main.py 4642db3 - Replaced imghdr with filetype for image detection 9825a3a - Added an unauthenticated API endpoint to test Bazarr availability: /api/system/ping 2c7294d - Fixed UnboundLocalError when viewing log files 84ebcf7 - Added Sync button to individual Series and Movie pages 525d569 - Fixed upgrade process again to prevent infinite loop of subtitles upgrade. #2749 81909ca - Added a validation to confirm if media file exists during initial sync before trying to search for subtitles. #2866 63a3622 - Added Weekly option to Search and Upgrade Subtitles settings 7dbc3cb - Fix for prior uppercase mod fix 31fe371 - Improved uppercase detection / execution in Fix Uppercase mod 2a330f6 - Fixed another issue with Yavka provider. #2225 cefd163 - Multiple providers - Removed overwrite of provider language object 515282e - Added animetosho provider german, vietnamese, russian and indonesian language support fa4aca8 - Regielive fix - Removed overwrite of provider language object 7cb471f - Fixed properly timezone usage to prevent high CPU usage. #1914 c22599a - Added animekalesi.com provider for Turkish Anime subtitles 3b4415e - Fixed additional error catching when trying to bind to IPv6 when it's not supported. #2738 fc9f94e - Added passing of video filename to detect-language for whisper provider 6c65267 - Fixed unwanted removal of subtitles format tags when using any mods. #2846 1a93eb4 - Fixed zimuku wrong archives subtitle language identified #2856 - Fixed unhandled exception during backup restoration process. #2850 2f16ae2 - Mods/Fix Uppercase: Fix broken uppercase detection in certain cases #2852 - Added Turkcealtyazi.org provider for Turkish subtitles 8ff5d58 - Added more debug logging to opensubtitles.com provider to help then investigate issues. 6d5ebb0 - Fixed UNC path parsing for Radarr sync d1775ff - Fixed upgrade process for translated subtitles. #2817 e2a3f36 - Added navigation bar shell scroll support 59d8243 - Added missing settings preventing proper download of subtitles. #2839 b9a0d9c - Added support for remote DNS query over socks5h proxy. #2839 bdbe946 - Fixed yavka.net provider by passing all form parameters and improved caching to reduce number of requests 99d9691 - Added scan Plex library option for new files after downloading subtitles 31400c8 - Added feature to change "added" info in Plex once subtitles are downloaded fe7b224 - Updated vendored modules 2fc8f10 - Fixed podnapisi TypeError since we've merged #2790. 6fc6ca5 - Fixed modal with tables application crash 4f77710 - Persist pages on url and hydrate on page load #2826 - Added some failsafe to RegieLive provider to try to prevent getting redirected to captcha validation or being completely blocked for a while. #2165 e17bad6 - Fixed issue with some custom languages subtitles while trying to index them. #2815 5888011 - Fixed issue with API not returning proper subtitles hi or forced subtitles in some edge cases e780edd - Removed opensubtitles.org deprecation announcement for VIP users. 9ac6c69 - Added mass delete subtitle files #2816 - Added TooManyRequests throttling to podnapisi provider. 6a791b2 - Improved assrt release name matching by ignoring meaningless values. #2761 2a038cd
